{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ZyXEL |model=WSR30 |series=AC2100 |fcc_date=11/01/2018 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Gemtek |type=wireless system |fcc_id=I88WSR30 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8198CS |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=512 |fla1_brand=ESMT |fla1_model=NAND |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=DDR3 |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip2_brand=Realtek |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_speed=1G |wan_ports=1 |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, Bluetooth 4.1 LE, wired backhaul, Alexa, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }}
:• '''867''' Mbps - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] backhaul (80MHz chan.), :• '''867''' Mbps - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] clients (80MHz chan.), :• '''300''' Mbps - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] clients (40MHz chan.) ~= '''''2100 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Multy U AC2100 Tri-Band WiFi System}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.zyxel.com/products_services/AC2100-Tri-Band-WiFi-System-Multy-U/}}{{SupportPage|vendor=ZyXEL|kbid=M-02859|model=Multy%20U%20(WSR30)}} "WRTT-335ACN_system_V02" and "ESK-T16-0702R RoHS" are silkscreened on the main board in the FCC photos. "ESK-T16-0602R RoHS" and "WRTT-335ACN_RF_board_V02" are silkscreened on the RF board in the FCC photos. The IDs of the three Realtek radio chips are not legible in the FCC photos. ===News=== *[https://www.taiwanexcellence.org/en/award/product/41866 ''Multy U AC2100 Tri-Band WiFi System'' on '''Taiwan Excellence'''] ===See also=== :[[List of Wireless Systems]] :[[List of Tri-Band Wireless Devices#AC3000]] *[[ZyXEL WSQ20]] - ''Multy Mini'' AC1750 (Router/Range Extender) *[[ZyXEL WSR30]] - ''Multy U'' AC2100 (Router/Range Extender) *[[ZyXEL WSQ50]] - ''Multy X'' AC3000 (Router/Range Extender) *[[ZyXEL WSQ60]] - ''Multy Plus'' AC3000 (Router/Range Extender) *[[ZyXEL WAP6804]] - ''Multy Pro'' AC2100 (Range Extender) *[[ZyXEL WAP6806 (Armor X1)|ZyXEL WAP6806]] - ''[[ZyXEL Armor X1 (WAP6806)]]'' *[[ZyXEL WAP6906]] - ''ZyXEL Armor X2'' (Tri-Band) *[[ZyXEL NBG6816]] - ''ZyXEL Armor Z1 (NBG6816)'' *[[ZyXEL NBG6817]] - ''ZyXEL Armor Z2 (NBG6817)'' *[[ZyXEL WAP6405]] - ''WiFi Video Bridge/AP'' __NOTOC__
